definitions.definition: A day that is an exact number of years (to the day) since a given significant event occurred. Often preceded by an ordinal number indicating the number of years.
examples: Today is the fiftieth anniversary of the end of the war.

subdefinitions.definition: Such a day that commemorates a wedding .
examples: We are celebrating our tenth anniversary today.

definitions.definition: A day subsequent in time to a given event by some significant period other than a year (especially as prefixed by the amount of time in question).

main_definition: A day that is an exact number of years (to the day) since a given significant event occurred. Often preceded by an ordinal number indicating the number of years.
secondary_definitions: ( loosely ) A day subsequent in time to a given event by some significant period other than a year (especially as prefixed by the amount of time in question).
